//testbench for imm testing opcode 6 for ADDI 
00000000 00000000
00000001 05031000 //SUb $2,$8,$3
00000002 00430800 //Add $1,$2,$3
00000003 0901F000 //AND $30, $8,$1
00000004 1502F800 //MUL $31,$8,$2
00000005 02682000 //ADD $4,$19,$8
00000006 03fa5000 //ADD $10, $31,$26
00000007 00000000
00000008 00000000
